definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: I have visited many blogs of Sina lately, and my blog had some visitors.
sentences.chinese: 近来访问了很多新浪博客，同时也得到一些博友来访。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近来，蜱媒传染病引起了国内传染病界的重视。

sentences.english: And these findings are more favourable to Bush than more recent surveys.
sentences.chinese: 与很多近来调查相比，这些调查结果比较倾向于布什。

sentences.english: Jack has been enthusing over the newcome girl recently.
sentences.chinese: 近来，杰克对新来的姑娘表现出热心。

sentences.english: Recently restaurants sell soups and drinks made from concentrate has brought into focus.
sentences.chinese: 近来，全城热议餐厅使用浓缩液制作汤及饮料。

sentences.english: She has produced very little recently.
In recent months, more than two dozen sub-prime lenders have closed their doors.
sentences.chinese: 近来数月，二十四家以上的低收入贷款公司关门大吉。

sentences.english: Recently there has been a welcome reversal of this trend.
sentences.chinese: 近来，这种趋势有了一个令人欢迎的逆转。

sentences.english: I would like to buy, rec Joyoung market a lot of soya-bean milk machin series.
sentences.chinese: 想买一台，近来市场上的九阳豆浆机有很多的系列。

sentences.english: all of people in the office concerned about she ,because no one has seen her lately.
sentences.chinese: 近来谁也不曾见过她，这使办公室所有同仁深感不安。

sentences.english: Recently with norfloxacin sulfonamides drug-drug, clinical results are satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 近来氟哌酸与磺胺药物联合应用，临床效果满意。

sentences.english: RIM's reply was one of the most hamfisted PR moves in recent memory.
sentences.chinese: RIM的回应堪称近来最糟糕的公关行为之一。

sentences.english: Most, if not all, OLAP servers implement XMLA these days.
sentences.chinese: 大多数OLAP服务器近来都实现了XMLA。

sentences.english: In light of the recent financial disturbances, some people think so.
sentences.chinese: 由于近来的金融动荡，一些人这样认为。

sentences.english: Recently the government has been stepping up efforts to eradicate such abuses.
sentences.chinese: 近来，中国政府正着力根除这些滥用短信的行为。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
the last few years/last several years/recent years
